user_query: My family and I are considering relocating to a new city and we need some information to make a decision. Can you provide us with the details of the place with Geoname ID '5391959'? Additionally, search for the closest schools to the location using the address '506 Fourth Avenue Unit 1, Asbury Prk, NJ' and share their contact information. Moreover, retrieve the boundaries of the postal district 'TW12' in the UK to compare with the neighborhoods in the potential new city.

TaskList.description: Retrieve detailed information about the location corresponding to Geoname ID '5391959'.
Search for the closest schools to the location using the address '506 Fourth Avenue Unit 1, Asbury Prk, NJ' and retrieve their contact information.
Retrieve the boundaries of the postal district 'TW12' in the UK.
